analysis.description:
WorldwideGiftCode.startDate (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c6818ff712bfcc59aad10442d25766e20d36ef3.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c6818ff712bfcc59aad10442d25766e20d36ef3.sol#223-235)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x7c6818ff712bfcc59aad10442d25766e20d36ef3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c6818ff712bfcc59aad10442d25766e20d36ef3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/26/0x7c6818ff712bfcc59aad10442d25766e20d36ef3.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
